title: Souya Monogatari
synopsis: The Souya is a Japanese museum ship that previously served as an icebreaker and patrol boat, and was the first Japanese ship to take part in an Antarctic research expedition.
staff: [['Shou', ['Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Yamamoto, Yuu', ['Series Composition']], ['Katsumata, Geki', ['Art Director']], ['Maekawa, Takashi', ['Special Effects']]]
